review_text:
Authentic cuisine and good taste. Food was served hot and service was good. Had dinner here for 4 person and we ordered "Dong Po" meat, stir fried corn kennel with pine nuts, steamed seabass, clear cucumber soup, brocolli with garlic all below the price of RMB400. Good food at Reasonable price. Restaurant is located just opposite of Beijing obstetrics and...
Ещё

Being near to where I stay and office. I have been back to this restaurant over 4 times in a month. I would very highly recomment the restaurant and chain to anyone looking for good sichuan food and at great value.
